modName: Katharinian Barefoot Legguards for DIMONIZED UNP female body
summary: Legwear from the followers of an obscure Imperial Saint, Katharina the Barefoot, they swore off footwear for their entire lives.
descriptionHtml:
Katharinian Armor for DIMONIZED UNP female body
Version: 1.2
Authors: calyps & DamarStiehl 

1.2 Forsworn footwear is up. 

1.1 Fixed issue with calves disappearing with some armors. I (calyps) would like to apologize for not fixing this sooner. 

NEXT: Forsworn boots.

DESCRIPTION:

The Katharinians were a small, all-female fighting unit that distinguished itself during the Great War. Followers of an obscure Imperial Saint, Katharina the Barefoot, they swore off footwear for their entire lives. Despite their heroism (or perhaps because of it), the Katharinians were annihilated during the Battle of the Red Ring. Their distinct leg armor became a curiosity that shows up every so often all over the former Imperial territories. During your travels, you met a blacksmith who had a light and a heavy versions of it in his collection, and he graciously taught you how to forge passable duplicates.

INSTALLATION:

Place the ESPs and the \"Meshes\" folder into your Skyrim Data folder, and check the ESP.

UNINSTALLATION:

Uncheck and remove the ESPs and remove the following files from Data\\\\meshes\\armor\\imperial\\f folder:

k_bootsheavy_0.nif
k_bootsheavy_1.nif
k_bootslight_0.nif
k_bootslight_1.nif

OBTAINING THE ARMOR PIECES:

Forge them at any forge. You will find them under the \"Imperial\" section. You will need Steel Smithing perk to forge the Heavy version.

KNOWN ISSUES:

- When dropped on the ground, they look like regular Imperial boots and Imperial heavy boots.
- When worn by male characters, they look like regular Imperial boots and Imperial heavy boots. THIS IS A FEMALE-ONLY ARMOR.
author: Calyps and DamarStiehl
